title: Golden Triangle
inclusions_evidence: "Airfares & transfers are additional"; "add international flights & comprehensive Travel Insurance"; "8-day tour departing Delhi 7-nights accommodation Hotels (6 nights), comfortable tented camp (1 night) Transport by private vehicle, taxis, auto-rickshaw, cycle-rickshaw"
reasoning: The Flight Centre deal lists 6 nights with private transport and guides for a total of 2378 for two (1189 pp). It explicitly states flights are not included (airfares & transfers are additional). Without a reliable DIY price from booking sites (e.g., Booking.com, Expedia, or supplier direct) for the same 6-night Golden Triangle itinerary including comparable hotels, transport, and guides, I cannot determine if the agency price is cheaper than DIY. The value appears reasonable, but lacks a verified DIY comparison, so the rating reflects potential value with incomplete verification.
